column1: I bought this while travelling in the UK and it has become a staple in my routine - however this product is not yet sold in Australia and I am running out! My skin feels soft and is noticeably hydrated. Please bring this product to Australia so my skin doesn't suffer!

This is literally my favorite moisturizer I've owned. It hydrates and doesn't cause any breakouts. It helps with the redness in my face and really soothes my sensitive acne prone skin. If you suffer from acne and are scared to try a moisturizer cause youre afraid of breakouts, try this one. It really is amazing and so gentle. I love it

This gentle product really does moisturize your skin. You can literally feel the water and moisture being drawn to your skin. It's a light gel consistency yet very moist. It literally does stay on all night. I used this on the dry patches on my face day and night lol. It has a very light fresh scent. Product compliments of influenster/simple. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It has a lovely watery texture that just glides on and absorbs remarkably quickly. Completely scent and dye free. It does make my skin tingle with every application, and brings up a light flush so I'm a little bit wary, but multiple applications have not caused any further reactions. I have almost finished the sample tub I received for free. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin overnight typically dries out pretty badly during my sleep during the wintertime. I put this on my face after my cleansing routing at night and wake up in the morning with a nicely moisturized face! It has kind of saved my skin from oil as well overnight. Thanks so much influenster for sending me this box for free! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this stuff. I have fair sentive skin and my cheeks get red easy. This cream never burns or irritates and has such a calming relieving feeling. Btw all of my other make up and serums are high end(no drugstore) so I don't buy this for the great price, I buy because it works

I got this complimentary of Influenster and it was really hydrating. It was super gentle and nice for sensitive skin. Did not cause any outbreaks & it made a difference to my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Bought both Simple skin n quench sleeping cream and hydrating gel cream and I have to say it's not a wow factor at all. My skin still gets dry in certain spots after awhile and have to reapply. I use facial oil to mix it with the moisturizer. I'm 50 now and it doesn't give radiance or collagen to my skin. Can still see dullness and fine lines. It's only good for basic moisturizer but nothing to improve skin tone and brightness. I don't think I'd purchase again. Sorry!
I will be so so so devastated if this is ever discontinued. It is one of the few things that calms my face down after a bad breakout!!

I have combination skin. This product yielded the same baby-soft skin that a high-end Korean sleeping cream did at half the price. No breakouts, ever, with Simple products. Reasonably priced, and they deliver excellent care for sensitive skin.
The cream itself is suitable for California winter. I woke up with drenched skin. It felt like a thin layer of oil is applied already to the face in the morning.
Love this stuff! Barely feel it on, and it's kind to my skin. Win win!

I have very dry skin and when I used this I could almost immediately feel my skin getting tighter. The next morning my skin actually felt drier since I subbed this in for my usual skincare routine. I received this product free for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am through my first pot and off to buy a second I have suffered from acne roseacea for 30years and has totally changed my complexion thanks to this lightweight highly moisturising cream no redness at all now and it feels amazing too apply...really refreshing! Don't stop this product simple it really does work well done and thumbs up simple!!

The day after I applied this, my skin formed tiny little bumps which is an immediate reaction I get when products just don't work on me. I like the consistency so I'm using the rest on my body which seems to handle it better than my sensitive skin on my face. I received the product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was able to try this out complimentary for testing purposes for Influenster, but it sadly didn't help my skin overnight. I have combination skin, so the first night I applied it all over my face and I woke up the next day very oily. The second night I decided to try out just the dry spots on my face and I noticed it did help them a little, but they still felt a bit dry. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am beyond happy that I received this product- not only does it hydrate beyond belief, it doesn't leave my skin oily! It's deeply moisturizing without leaving any residue on the skin! Thank you Simple Skincare! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product made my skin feel so wonderful in the morning. I hate heavy creams, and this one was very light and felt so good on my skin. My only wish would be for the company to be completely cruelty free! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Received this in my voxbox and was very excited to try it. I've been using it every night and can really see how hydrating it is on my skin. I've used many other products for moisture and none compare to this one. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the Simple Skin Quench Sleeping Cream for a few reasons: 1 - The cream is not scented. 2 - The cream has a "cooling" effect at skin's first touch. 3 - Extremely moisturizing. I highly recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for review and absolutely loved it. It provides great hydration while you are sleeping so that you have a fresh hydrated face before you apply makeup the next day! It is comparable to Clinique's moisture surge. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been traveling a lot due to different acting gigs. From Hong Kong to LA.. plane rides galore and my skin gave up on me. All of the sudden it became so dry and was sensitive to every “natural” moisturizer I tried. Until I tried Simple- Skin Quenching Sleeping cream. I can not go to sleep without it, the difference for my skin from only the first time is unbelievable. My skin now feels so refreshed thanks to this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It's worth a try if you're having some dry skin issues! However i wasn't the biggest fan, felt and sat weird on my skin and it made me break out for a few days after the first few times of using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use the cream at night after I wash my face and I can immediately feel my face smooth! I wash my face apply the cream and when I wake up my skin looks clean and feels smooth to the touch! I absolutely love this product! I received it from Influenster as a promo to test out the product. I like the product so much that I will be purchasing once my sample runs out (: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this cream and I was scared because it says that is ULTRA moiaturizing and I'm oily skin. I can tell you that I have been using it every night and it feels so fresh like a splash of water, can't miss it on my night routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was sent this product free by influenster, it is amazing! I have used it every night for about a month, and it has changed my skin drastically! I have eczema, which makes my face very dry, this moisturizer has helped it a lot! It is not oily, nor does it leave a greasy film over my face. Overall a great nighttime moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for free thanks to Influenster and I totally love it... is perfect for winter time. Really refresh and hydrate your skin. Is amazing. In the next morning you will have a brand new face. I definitely going to buy it! [] I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Really enjoyed this moisturizer! It feels thick and hydrating but not too heavy or oily on the skin. I loved putting this on at night because it kept my face hydrated through the dry winter nights with the heater blasting! I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes and my skin is thanking me :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really enjoyed trying this product, however, I did not find it to be as helpful or moisturizing as I wanted it to be. I've had other face creams that were better for night repair. Not bad, just not enough to buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wear this as my everyday lotion and it leaves my face feeling super soft. It's very lightweight which is great to wear under makeup. Reminds me a lot of the tatcha water cream. I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It is so hydrating for my skin. I received it complimentary in a package. I really enjoyed it, and I am going to buy it again and again. I have been recommending it to friends. I have oily skin, so it is perfectly light. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pleasantly surprised by the product. It worked great to hydrate my dry skin. The product absorbed nicely and left my skin feeling plump and refreshed after application. My skin also felt silky smooth the mornings after use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product complimentary for testing and I've been using it for about a month now. At first I wasn't sure that it was doing anything to my skin until I decided to lather a little bit more on than I usually did at night time. This made a huge difference! This product hydrates my skin and I noticed fewer dehydration lines than before. This cream always leaves my skin feeling rejuvenated and so silky smooth after I apply and it dries. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for testing purpose. I absolutely love it! During the winter, my skin gets especially dry overnight. I love how refreshed my skin feels when I put it on & it doesn't feel thick. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this complimentary from Influenster, and I was sceptical at first but ended up loving it! I use it to moisturize my face during these cold winters during the day and before I go to bed! It's thin a almost fragrance free but I have seen a difference in my skins texture since using it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I typically don't use many products in my night time routine but this stuff is great! I love the light, airy feeling when you put it on. The next morning expect moisturized, non-greasy skin. I recommend this sleeping cream. After getting it for free in my voxbox from Influenster, I could see myself buying it in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This sleeping mask is the best! I received this product free and I thought why not try it. After one try, I have been using it every night. I have combination skin and this helps dramatically for my set areas and keeps my oil areas maintained. I would highly recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The cream is very lightweight and feels cool when applied. It felt very light. However, don't let the lightweight look and feel fool you. This cream was very moisturizing. I woke up with non-oily, dewy, hydrated skin.
I received this product for free for testing purposes in exchange for my honest review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin has been super dry due to this crazy NC winter but after trying the Simple skin quench sleeping cream my skin was so hydrated and glowing after 2 days. So thrilled i received it as a complimentary gift in my Influenster box [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This stuff is amazing! A little goes a VERY long way, and it is so hydrating! I have dry patches on my face, and my face can become VERY dry. I put this on throughout the day to be honest. But only if my skin is super dry. It does wonders [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Hi
I received this product complimentary to try it out.
I really find this product very moisturizing. It does exactly what it describes it does. I would recommend this as well as their other products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This sleeping cream is VERY lighweight, it is more watery/get consistency. It does moisturize but, I personally like a thicker moisturizer for night time. I think it would be perfect for people that likes lightweight moisturizers. I love that it's scentless and that it's SIMPLE (not many ingredients so perfect for delicate skins). I received this product for free for teating purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Being a flight attendant, my dry skin needs all the help it can get. This sleeping mask has a gel-like texture that I love slathering on post-shower. Great product. Pro-tip: mix with your favorite night cream. I received this product from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin was a treacherous desert due to the bi-polar Texas weather. With incorporating this into my routine it has become a smooth buttery canvas! I revived this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have sensitive skin and finding skin care products that won't cause me to break out, but also doesn't leave my skin too dry or too oily is very hard. With this sleeping cream, my skin feels great and helps take care of some of my pesky skin problems. I will definitely be adding it to my daily skincare routine. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes, but will be buying it again and again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this night time hydrating moisturizer! My skin feels refreshed when I wake up and so smooth the next day! Only a little bit of the product is needed because it goes a long way! It doesn't leave an oily finish and has a brightening effect! I got this in a complementary voxbox and will be buying this when I'm out! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This sleeping cream works wonders, I love how light it is but also so moisturizing. I put it on every night before bed & I can tell it gives me more moisture than all other lotions I've tried. It's great for anyone with sensitive skin. I always make sure to apply this after I've removed my makeup with the Simple makeup remover pads. I received the product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love how this cream makes my skin feel! My face is so soft after each use. This formula is not greasy and does not feel heavy on my skin. I received this product strictly for testing purposes for free! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely loved this product it had my face feeling really moisturised i am in ny and the cold air has been really drying out my skin. I used a little and it does the job i wake up and my skin still feels good. I did recieve this product from influenster for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream is amazing. I've used it for weeks now and it not only has made my skin soft to the touch but it has also helped with my breakouts. It's made my skin look radiant plus its got a gentle formula so it's even good for sensitive skin! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So I received this cool free package from Influenster I didn't try it out right away just because I was a bit scared to try I've used many different products to hydrate my skin but they would all leave my face either sticky or super oily now let me tell you when I tried this product I was shocked it left my skin super soft not oily at all I received this packag for testing purposes but I loved it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really felt like this product was light and soft on my skin. It felt refreshing and not too oily. I thought it made my skin feel soft overnight too. It was a bit tingly at first but that's how you know it's working. I received this as a free testing sample. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am so happy I get to use this product. I truthfully did not even notice my skin was so dry until after I started using it. I can really tell a difference in my skin recently. It feels more hydrated and soft. The product doesn't go on heavily and feels like it's not clogging my pores. I am very impressed with this product and plan on continuing to use it! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product has become part of my nightly skin routine! it makes my skin feel so soft and hydrated after I wash my face at night. I've noticed that my face feels less dry when I wake up in the morning as well! I received this product for test purposes but all opinions are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is the perfect moisturizer. It was so lightweight I barley knew it was on, and when I woke up my skin was noticeable more hydrated after one night. My complexion was brighter and after a couple nights my skin looked more even. Love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I play softball which means i am always in the sun.. this then leads to very dry skin. The sleeping cream has made A HUGE difference in my skin. I don't have to worry so much about it being so dry all the time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely loved this overnight hydration cream! It is so lightweight and refreshing that I have even starting using it during the day as a moisturizer. I've been waking up feeling refreshed and baby soft. It's hard for me to find creams that work because I have combination skin, but this cream does wonders for my dry spots without making me oily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got This as an influencer box & I loved it! I used It up so I bought More! Lightweight, also I have Very sensitive skin & this product doesn't make my face breakout what so ever! Love love it! Absolutely would recommend it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product complimentary. This was fantastic!! I have sensitive skin and this light weight formula felt so good applying and in the morning. It didn't have me breakout at all. Super sensitive with super results. I love my morning skin, it feels softer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Okay so I received this product for free for testing so I wasn't too sure about how great it was going to be. But holy cow my skin hasn't never been this soft. Usually in the winter I have insanely dry skin and I haven't even had a dry patch since I've started using this product. There's no overwhelming smell either, which I think is a giant plus. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So far, I'm loving this moisturizer! It doesn't feel thick and heavy like most moisturizers- it goes on really light. It feels super soothing without making my face feel oily. My skin can get really dry with all the acne products that I'm using, but since using the moisturizer, I haven't had any problems with dryness. I was hoping that the light formula might help my acne, but I haven't noticed a significant change in regards to my acne yet. But overall, love this moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentary product for testing purposes. I was so impressed with this product. I needed something that felt like it was strengthening while soothing my skin and this was perfect for it. I am so impressed and I am very interested in buying the full size. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love the way this cream feels on my face! In the morning my face feels soft and hydrated. I'm so thankful I got to test this product for free, but I'm definitely going to buy more when I'm out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for free and I absolutely love it. I will definitely buy it. it is light weight and makes my skin feel so smooth. It is the perfect night cream. I highly recommend buying this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentary moisturizer and absolutely love. I am always very picky about night time moisturizers as I have oily skin however this perfectly balances everything out. It is smooth and not super heavy on my face which I love. I wake up moisturized but not greasy feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product was very helpful on my dry skin from the harsh cold weather. I used this along side my normal skin care routine and I woke up with smooth skin! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the product for testing purposes and honestly I pat the cream on my face every night and my skin feels so moisturized the moment it touched my skin. My skin feel so fresh and soft after each use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream leaves my skin feeling refreshed and smooth when I wake up in the morning! I have very sensitive skin and this hasn't irritated it one bit. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have dry skin to begin with so winter in the Northeast can be a nightmare. Adding this product on top of my hydrating oil has been a great combination to lock in moisture. It takes a little while to soak in due to the layering but it never feels greasy or heavy. This is my first experience with a product from the brand Simple and am now interested in trying more! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes and I am in love with it. This cream is truly moisturizing and doesn't make my face feel oily when I wake up. My skin is very soft when I wake up and perfect for the winter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After washing my face at night, I applied the moisturizer to my entire face and neck. It wasn't oily or greasy, which I love. Most moisturizers are really oily and shiny. It didn't leave my face sticky either. After waking up in the morning, my face was really soft and look moisturized. I'm so glad I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

A little really goes a long way with this sleeping cream! It's super lightweight and doesn't feel greasy and heavy like other hydrating creams! It soaked into my skin pretty fast and has left it feeling soft and hydrated! I'm a pretty big fan of this product and plan on repurchasing! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this sleeping cream compliments of Influenster, and though it is very hydrating when during initial application on my face, there was a slight tingly feeling afterwards. I was slightly paranoid that it was irritating my face so I read the ingredients list which included more components than I expected. I may try this product again during the warmer months when my skin is not as dehydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this product for a couple of days now and I'm really enjoying it. I have oily skin so the formula on this product id perfect because its lighweight and it doesn't sit on my face. It really leaves your face with a silky texture and my face does feel hydrated yet not greasy in the morning. {thanks to Influenster and Simple skincare for allowing me to test this product for free<3} [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the smell and texture of the product. It would be great for someone with normal to dry skin. But as someone with very dry and sensitive skin, I found that it made my cheeks a little blotchy by the morning. I did receive this product free for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been looking for an eye cream for some time now and I can honestly say, I love this stuff. The serum is super moisturizing and not too oily. I use retinal so my eyes dry out too much.. this definitely repairs my skin. It's a good buy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This feels really nice on my skin. The texture is soft and silky. It's light weight and feels like silky water when applying on my face. I notice in the morning my face feels smooth and soft. It's perfect for sensitive skin. The smell is so faint you can barley make it out. It also has a pleasant tingly feeling. I really like this product. I received this complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was given this product for free to test and I am so glad!!! I have combination skin and it's sometimes hard to find a moisturizer that is the right balance of hydrating and not too oily! This is perfect! If I'm using it overnight, I apply two layers to really let it sink into my skin; I also use it daily before my primer in a thin layer!! This is such an amazing product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was given this product for free to review and I actually think it was great! I was peeling a bit from tanning and putting this on before bed 3 nights in a row make my skin super soft in the morning, would definitely purchase! I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was sent this product complimentary to try out and it was so nice! I have oily and acne prone skin so i don't like a cream product that makes me feel more oily which is why i love this product! It leaves the skin feeling hydrated and refreshed all throughout the night. Definitely adding this to my everyday skincare routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This sleep cream is AMAZING. I received this product free through Influenster for testing/reviewing purposes and I am SO glad I received this product. This crazy weather has dried out my skin and this product has given it the moisture that it desperately needed, I love it so much that I've been using it during the day as well! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the Skin Quench Sleeping Cream. I received this complimentary product for testing purposes but love the feel already. The cream is light weight and gel based. It feels awesome going on and left my skin feeling super hydrated until the morning. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using the Simple micellar make-up remover eye pads, I used this product on my face before going to sleep. I woke up the next morning and most definitely had a glow to my face i haven't seen in a while, a good glow not because my face was oily glow. My skin felt so refreshed and renewed, it was just an amazing feeling. I received this product as complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I put a medium amount of this cream on my face before bed, rubbing most of it in. It felt great on my skin and when I woke up, it felt great! My skin wasn't dry when I woke up, and it looked nice and clean! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I live in Ohio, and right now it's super dry outside, so I was really excited when I received this product. I put it on my face and neck and night and within a day my skin was much more moisturized and the redness in my cheeks was almost completely gone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this simple water boost skin quench sleeping cream free for testing purposes through Influenster. My skin is super dry and always so sensitive and thus sleeping cream brought back alot of the moister my skin was lacking. I like that this cream was scent free and unlike other creams it was very thin and didn't leave and oily or sticky after feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this cream complimentary via influenster to try and have been using it for about a week. I really like how light weight it is. It feels like you're putting water on your face honestly. My skin is brighter and more moisturized in the mornings. This will be a new staple in my skin care regime. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product has been a miracle worker for my skin! I absolutely love this. It has a very water-like formula that sinks into the skin. I wake up every morning with silky smooth skin and I love it. I also probably use too much of the product because it feels so refreshing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried this product out for the first time last night after receiving it for free in a voxbox! It almost reminds me of a face mask because when you apply it to your face it has a jelly like consistency. It soaks into your skin but not too fast! I woke up with really soft skin. I will keep testing this out to see if it continues to work well for me! The product has no smell to it. I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product. It makes my face look so radiant and hydrated. I wake up feeling so refreshed and my skin feels awake and rejuvenated. I received this product complimentary for testing. Thank you for this new fave of mine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved it, mimha skin is super sensitive and prone to acne, but it made my skin super good, it's cleaner and more moisturized. it is now one of my favorite skin care products. super recommend it. received by @influenster for free. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just got this in my Voxbox and the first night I used it I was pretty much amazed how lightweight it felt on my skin and how hydrating it was! For someone oily I think this would be a good night cream product because it was more of a gel consistency rather than a heavy cream which I love. It is very lightweight on the skin and it soaked into my skin real fast. I didn't feel like I had product on my face which I love and best of all there was no scent! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So I received my voxbox for free of this product and oh my gosh I love this stuff! I do my nightly routine,washing my face and applying my toner and moisturizer and then to too it all off I apply this super soft sleeping cream all over my face and it leaves it as smooth as can be. I will definitely be purchasing this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Ive been using this product for four days. One star for each day, the only reason i didnt give it 5 stars is because as a "sleeping cream" i expect it to provide more hydration. When I wake up the next morning my skin doesn't look as fresh and soft as when I use my Cerave night cream. This could also be affected by the harsh winter weather in NYC. I will continue to use this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So I had been using clean and clear to deep clean my pores as a result my face dried up terribly, first time this had ever happened but HAVE NO FEAR skin quench sleeping cream has already cleared up my dryness and I've used it twice!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked how this product works. It really does hydrate/mosturize my face, this is perfect for sensitive skin it doesn't irritate. Doesn't have a strong scent which personally is a + for me. You just apply it at night a small cost and in the morning your skin feel so smooth and fresh. I totally recommend it. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this product at CVS and paid full price for it. It leaves my skin moisturized and smooth withouf any residue ou greasiness. My skin absorbs it almost immediately. Highly recommended. Now my husband is using it too.
The cream is lightweight and absorbs quickly into skin, it feels really refreshing and leaves my skin moisturized! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I am in love with this moisturizer!!! I have dry skin and this doesn't break me out but it makes my skin feel so good. I received this for free. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Very Moisturizing! My nose gets so so dry. This actually does a good job helping with that. I received this free from Influenster for review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved this night cream it felt so moisturizing! I liked how it felt like my skin was really getting a ton of tlc right before I went to bed. When I woke up my skin felt so soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I liked this sleeping cream, although I did not use it every night. When I did, it made my skin feel very refreshed! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this free from Influenster to try, over all it was alright, I have moisturizers that work better than this one. I have extremely dry skin and this just didn't do the job for me [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received this product from influencer and my life has changed. I now use this product everyday in my life. It is an amazing product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Thought this was alright. I've had better but this is good for drug store. I'd recommend it for people with little dryness due to not thinking it's totally hydrating. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have very dry skin and this really helped. I feel that my skin is more soft and moisturized. I received this from Influenster and am very thankful that i got it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
great formula, lightweight, and not scented heavily, also did not cause any irritation or breakouts. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
